kwargs.content: think long and hard before writing a poem

The mind, a quiet, fallow field,
Awaiting seeds it has concealed.
No hasty furrow, shallow cut,
But patient pause, before input.

It sifts the air, the light, the sound,
The silent hum of all around.
Considers shape, and shade, and hue,
The many ways that seeing's true.

It weighs the words, their feel, their taste,
Where hurried phrase can lay to waste
The fragile thought, the nascent rhyme,
That ripens only within time.

So here I wait, and turn, and ponder,
Let images and feelings wander,
Before the pen begins to trace,
The poem finds its time and space.

**Find**a Contractor
====================

Selecting a qualified electrical contractor for your home or business can be challenging. You know something is wrong, but you lack the expertise to diagnose the problem yourself – and you are at the mercy of the supposed expert. Most electrical contractors are specialists to one degree or another, so it helps to identify your particular needs before you start calling.

### [Login for more options.](https://www.necanet.org/login?ReturnUrl=https%3a%2f%2fwww.necanet.org%2fabout-neca%2fdirectories%2ffind-a-contractor)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### How many Electrical contractors in Arizona are on the Procore Construction Network?

There are currently 1,639 Electrical contractors in Arizona on the Procore Construction Network.

### How can I find and connect with Electrical contractors in Arizona?

The Procore Construction Network allows you to search for Electrical contractors in Arizona that meet your business needs. Most companies provide a phone number or website on their business page so you can easily connect with them.

### How can Electrical contractors in Arizona join the Procore Construction Network?

The Procore Construction Network is free and open to any businesses in the construction industry. Click [Sign Up](https://www.procore.com/network/signup) at the top of this page to submit your information and create your business page.

### How do I know what areas Electrical contractors in Arizona cover?

Most businesses listed on the Procore Construction Network have updated their service area. Select a business to view a service area map and find what other areas they work in.
